Integration marketplace for Manatal
# Overview
Made with love by Robin
# Authentication
Manatal token
# Error Codes
You'd better not make any mistake

Get extra fields
Integrations
response.body:
{
    "count": 2,
    "next": null,
    "previous": null,
    "results": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Codility",
            "status": "active",
            "short_description": "Codility is the #1 rated technical recruitment platform for teams to test the coding skills of developers and make evidence-based hiring decisions.",
            "description": "Integrating your existing tech recruiting tools can help your team save a lot of time, improve the speed of information transfer from Recruiters to Hiring Managers and ensures your knowledge management is automatically working well for you.\r\nIf you haven't already, read our API Documentation so you can begin to understand how it works and take a look at the API itself and what it generates. \r\n\r\nOnce you know you want to create an integration, you'll first need to register your application with us to get your API token.",
            "instructions": "Integrating your existing tech recruiting tools can help your team save a lot of time, improve the speed of information transfer from Recruiters to Hiring Managers and ensures your knowledge management is automatically working well for you.\r\nIf you haven't already, read our API Documentation so you can begin to understand how it works and take a look at the API itself and what it generates. \r\n\r\nOnce you know you want to create an integration, you'll first need to register your application with us to get your API token.",
            "logo": null,
            "cover_logo": null,
            "url": "https://support.codility.com/",
            "terms_conditions_url": "https://support.codility.com/",
            "privacy_policy_url": "https://support.codility.com/",
            "categories": [
                "assessment"
            ],
            "created_at": "2022-03-03T10:10:56.299224Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-03-03T10:10:56.299255Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "MailChimp",
            "status": "not_yet_available",
            "short_description": "Mailchimp is an American marketing automation platform and email marketing service for managing mailing lists and creating email marketing campaigns to send to customers. Mailchimp is the trading name of its operator, Rocket Science Group, an American com",
            "description": "Founder story\r\nAbout 20 years ago, Ben Chestnut and Dan Kurzius started a web design agency called the Rocket Science Group. Their focus was on big, corporate clients, but on the side, they created a delightful email marketing service for small businesses.\r\n\r\nMailchimp was designed as an alternative to the oversized, expensive email software of the early 2000s. It gave small business owners who lacked the high-end tools and resources of their larger competitors access to technology that empowered them and helped them grow.",
            "instructions": "Founder story\r\nAbout 20 years ago, Ben Chestnut and Dan Kurzius started a web design agency called the Rocket Science Group. Their focus was on big, corporate clients, but on the side, they created a delightful email marketing service for small businesses.\r\n\r\nMailchimp was designed as an alternative to the oversized, expensive email software of the early 2000s. It gave small business owners who lacked the high-end tools and resources of their larger competitors access to technology that empowered them and helped them grow.",
            "logo": null,
            "cover_logo": null,
            "url": "https://mailchimp.com/about/",
            "terms_conditions_url": "https://mailchimp.com/about/",
            "privacy_policy_url": "https://mailchimp.com/about/",
            "categories": [
                "assessment"
            ],
            "created_at": "2022-03-03T10:11:48.341766Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-03-03T10:11:48.341789Z"
        }
    ]
}

response.name: Get integration
response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Codility",
    "status": "active",
    "short_description": "Codility is the #1 rated technical recruitment platform for teams to test the coding skills of developers and make evidence-based hiring decisions.",
    "description": "Integrating your existing tech recruiting tools can help your team save a lot of time, improve the speed of information transfer from Recruiters to Hiring Managers and ensures your knowledge management is automatically working well for you.\r\nIf you haven't already, read our API Documentation so you can begin to understand how it works and take a look at the API itself and what it generates. \r\n\r\nOnce you know you want to create an integration, you'll first need to register your application with us to get your API token.",
    "instructions": "Integrating your existing tech recruiting tools can help your team save a lot of time, improve the speed of information transfer from Recruiters to Hiring Managers and ensures your knowledge management is automatically working well for you.\r\nIf you haven't already, read our API Documentation so you can begin to understand how it works and take a look at the API itself and what it generates. \r\n\r\nOnce you know you want to create an integration, you'll first need to register your application with us to get your API token.",
    "logo": null,
    "cover_logo": null,
    "url": "https://support.codility.com/",
    "terms_conditions_url": "https://support.codility.com/",
    "privacy_policy_url": "https://support.codility.com/",
    "categories": [
        "assessment"
    ],
    "created_at": "2022-03-03T10:10:56.299224Z",
    "updated_at": "2022-03-03T10:10:56.299255Z"
}
